introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we build native apps (Swift, Kotlin) for ultimate performance and cross-platform apps (Flutter, React Native) for faster development. Our apps are intuitive, secure, and scalable, with seamless integration to backends, APIs, and cloud services.
We’ve delivered apps for e-commerce, fintech, healthcare, SaaS, logistics, and social platforms, ensuring businesses can engage, convert, and retain users on mobile devices.

questions.question: Can you build apps for both iOS and Android?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: How secure are your enterprise solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: Do you work with existing ERP/CRM systems?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: Can you scale apps as our business grows?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
